name: sellit-cursor
description: SellIt monorepo (Express + MongoDB backend, React + TS frontend).

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm -w backend run dev" "npm -w frontend run dev"
scripts.dev:e2e: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm -w backend run dev:e2e" "npm -w frontend run dev"
scripts.test: npm -w backend test && npm -w frontend test
scripts.lint: npm -w backend run lint && npm -w frontend run lint
scripts.build: npm -w backend run build && npm -w frontend run build
